resource_gathering.description: Gather specific resources within time limit
resource_gathering.objective: Collect 10 wood logs, 5 stone blocks, and 3 coal within 5 minutes

structure_building.description: Build a specific structure following instructions
structure_building.objective: Build a 4x4 house with walls, roof, door, and at least one window

combat_survival.description: Survive combat encounters with hostile mobs
combat_survival.objective: Survive for 10 minutes during night time with at least 3 hostile mob kills

problem_solving.description: Solve a complex problem requiring planning
problem_solving.objective: Cross a lava pit, retrieve a chest item, and return safely
problem_solving.success_criteria: Player obtains target item and returns to starting position
